last_episode_to_air.name: The Makluan Invasion Part 2: Unite!
last_episode_to_air.overview: Iron Man, War Machine and Rescue must unite Nick Fury, Hawkeye, Black Widow, Black Panther and the Hulk to stop the Makluan Overlord from destroying the Earth.

name: Iron Man: Armored Adventures
overview:
Iron Man: Armored Adventures is a 3D CGI cartoon series based on the Marvel Comics superhero Iron Man. It debuted in the USA on the Nicktoons on April 24, 2009, and has already begun airing on Canadian network Teletoon. Iron Man: Armored Adventures aired on Nickelodeon on July 4, 2009 until September 12, 2009. The series is story edited by showrunner Christopher Yost, who also worked on Wolverine and the X-Men, and numerous other Marvel Animation projects. The television show is not related to the 2007 animated film The Invincible Iron Man; It has a different voice cast, but some story elements are similar and the show uses the same musical score as the film in some instances. It is the first Iron Man television series since Iron Man from 1994–1996, and started airing after the success of the live action Iron Man film.

The series follows the adventures of teenage child prodigy Tony Stark and his alter ego of Iron Man. As Iron Man, he uses his technological inventions to fight various similarly technologically advanced threats. His friends, James "Rhodey" Rhodes and Pepper Potts help him on his courageous, and dangerous adventures.

episodes.name: Iron Forged in Fire: Part One
episodes.overview: Tony Stark is left the sole survivor when his father's plane crashes. Now an orphan, he is presented with a questionable 'last request' of his father: live with the Rhodes and go to school. Encouraged by Pepper Potts and assisted by Jim Rhodes, the 16 year old genius begins to investigate the suspicious activities carried out by Obadiah Stane, the new C.E.O. of Stark Industries. But an even deadlier foe is waiting... The Mandarin.

episodes.name: Iron Forged in Fire: Part Two
episodes.overview: Mandarin has trouble win his son, Gene Khan, while trying to retrieve the rings. Tony Stark as Iron Man battles his invention that Obadiah transformed into a weapon. Mandarin steals the ring of Obadiah, and fights Iron Man. Back in Mandarin's lair it is revealed that Gene Khan has become The Mandarin.

episodes.name: Secrets and Lies
episodes.overview: After Tony is captured by a secret organization, he learns that Gene's father has something to do with it.

episodes.name: Cold War
episodes.overview: Despite Rhodey's reservations, Iron Man builds an alliance with a man named Blizzard. Wanting to take out Obadiah Stane, Tony feels that the new partnership will be beneficial. But is Blizzard all that he seems to be?

episodes.name: Whip Lash
episodes.overview: When Pepper's father is targeted by arms dealer Mister Fix, Tony must save the day without revealing his secret. However, this task becomes nearly impossible when Mister Fix sends his agent Whiplash after Pepper.

episodes.name: Iron Man VS The Crimson Dynamo
episodes.overview: Ivan Vanko, a scientist who was thought to have been left in space two years ago, crash lands in New York City. Alive because of an environmental suit, called the Crimson Dynamo, Vanko seeks revenge on the program that put him in space in the first place- Project Pegasus. It's up to Iron Man to stop Vanko from destroying Project Pegasus.

episodes.name: Meltdown
episodes.overview: The pressures of living a normal teenage life and being Iron Man become too much for Tony. Deciding he doesn't need school anymore, Tony quits and focuses on saving the world as Iron Man full time. But when a new villain, called the Living Laser, appears, Tony learns that he has to graduate in order to take over Stark Industries.

episodes.name: Field Trip
episodes.overview: Tony sneaks into Stark International to catch a glimpse of the new Stealth Armor. Unfortunately, the building locks down and Tony is stuck inside. With the help of Rhodey and Pepper, Tony must find a way out of the building without revealing his secret identity.

episodes.name: Ancient History 101
episodes.overview: Tony and his friends' search for the ancient Makluan Rings goes awry when the guardians of the Rings, the Dreadknights, arrive.

episodes.name: Ready, A.I.M., Fire
episodes.overview: During the school science fair, Tony is approached by the leaders of an organization known as the Advanced Idea Mechanics. Offering up his help, Tony inadvertantly creates a new enemy, the Controller. With Tony's friends under its control, Iron Man must step in and save the day.

episodes.name: Masquerade
episodes.overview: When Obadiah Stane starts acting strangely, Iron Man investigates. It turns out that Madame Masque, a shape shifting villain, was posing as Obadiah and she has a new target: Iron Man. Now, Tony must clear Iron Man's name after the police come looking for him.

episodes.name: Seeing Red
episodes.overview: Project Pegasus, under the control of Obadiah Stane, creates an upgraded version of the Crimson Dynamo. With it, they capture Iron Man and begin analyzing the suit. After Rhodey and Pepper bust Iron Man out, Tony is ready for revenge. This time, Iron Man takes on the Crimson Dynamo with help from his new upgrade- the Dynamo Buster Armor.

episodes.name: Hide and Seek
episodes.overview: When Tony and Gene find the third Makluan Ring, they argue over what exactly to do with it. Taking matters into his own hands, Gene accidentally unlocks the ring's guardian, Ultimo. Iron Man tries to detain Ultimo, but is forced to deal with the return of the Mandarin as well.

episodes.name: Man and Iron Man
episodes.overview: Mister Fix equips Whiplash with a deadly new virus that infects Iron Man's suit. When Iron Man goes online by itself, Tony is stuck inside the suit. Unable to find a way out, Tony fears that he'll never be able to leave Iron Man behind.

episodes.name: Panther's Prey
episodes.overview: When Iron Man tracks Moses Magnum to A.I.M.'s secret headquarters, he meets someone else who's after Magnum, the Black Panther. Thinking they'll be able to work together, Iron Man goes to the Black Panther for help. Unfortunately, Black Panther is only after Magnum and threatens to reveal Tony's secret if he gets in the way.

episodes.name: Fun with Lasers
episodes.overview: When the Living Laser threatens the Earth via a space satellite, Iron Man steps in to save the day. Soon, however, Nick Fury and S.H.I.E.L.D. contact Tony and tell him not to interfere. Not knowing who to fully trust, Tony is left feeling unsure of what to do.

episodes.name: Chasing Ghosts
episodes.overview: When the Ghost comes after Tony, Madame Masque mysteriously steps in to protect him. Fearing that his friends will get hurt, Tony begins to push them away. Unfortunately, the Ghost captures Madame Masque and Tony is forced to call on his friends for help.

episodes.name: Pepper, Interrupted
episodes.overview: When Pepper gets caught up in the middle of a feud between the Tong and the Maggia, the Mandarin calls on an unlikely source for help - Iron Man.

episodes.name: Technovore
episodes.overview: After Tony accidentally creates an evil virus known as Technovore, he believes that it is gone for good. Unfortunately, the virus grows bigger and sets its sights on Iron Man.

episodes.name: World on Fire
episodes.overview: Upon retrieving the fourth Makluan Ring, Gene recalls memories of his mother and his birthright. The guardian of said Ring, Firebrand, traps Pepper and Rhodey inside an active volcano and Iron Man must get them out before it erupts.

episodes.name: Designed Only for Chaos
episodes.overview: A.I.M. uses a dying Living Laser to power up their newest creation- the Mental Organism Designed Only for Conquest. When Iron Man can't beat MODOC's mental powers, it's up to the Living Laser to save his life.

episodes.name: Don't Worry be Happy
episodes.overview: After Tony lets Rhodey take the Iron Man suit out for a spin, it falls into the hands of Happy Hogan. Now, Tony must help Hogan take down a Maggia plot, all while not revealing his secret.

episodes.name: Uncontrollable
episodes.overview: The Controller uses a boy named Rick Jones to get the Hulk to take revenge on A.I.M. Stepping in, Iron Man is taken over by the Controller and only the Hulk can stop him.

episodes.name: Best Served Cold
episodes.overview: Obadiah Stane calls on Tony to find a cure for his daughter Whitney's disease. Knowing of a cure that exists in an abandoned Stark facility in the Arctic, Iron Man heads off to find it. Unable to sit around and do nothing, Stane forces Blizzard to go get the cure as well.

episodes.name: Tales of Suspense: Part 1
episodes.overview: Zhang, Gene Khan's father and the former Mandarin, captures Tony and his friends in order to retrieve all five Makluan Rings. When the guardian of the fifth ring is released, the mighty dragon Fin Fang Foom becomes quite a challenge for the gang. Will Tony and Gene be able to save the day without the help of the Iron Man suit or the other Makluan Rings?

episodes.name: Tales of Suspense: Part 2
episodes.overview: Doning the War Machine suit, Rhodey arrives just in time to save his friends from Fin Fang Foom. Now, it's the battle of the century as Iron Man and War Machine face off against Fin Fang Foom and the Mandarin.

episodes.name: The Invincible Iron Man Part 1: Disassembled!
episodes.overview: Tony must use his armor for the first time in months when Mr. Fix's boss orders the abduction of Justin Hammer and Obadiah Stane.

episodes.name: The Invincible Iron Man Part 2: Reborn!
episodes.overview: With his father's company on the line, Tony must wear his new armor and join War Machine to defeat his enemies.

episodes.name: Look Into the Light
episodes.overview: When Mr. Fix is split into two halves, the Light Half seeks Iron Man's help in preventing the Dark Half from destroying the planet.

episodes.name: The Ghost in the Machine
episodes.overview: Stane hires a ghost to help him acquire the Iron Man armor.

episodes.name: Armor Wars
episodes.overview: Stane creates mass-produced heroes using Tony's stolen specifications; Iron Man must try to discredit the new heroes.

episodes.name: Line of Fire
episodes.overview: While investigating attacks on Hammer Multinational, Tony uncovers Stark International's involvement in a civil war.

episodes.name: Titanium vs. Iron
episodes.overview: Hammer's new creation badly damages War Machine and nearly destroys the Iron Man armor.

episodes.name: The Might of Doom
episodes.overview: Doctor Doom arrives in New York to collect stolen Iron Man specs.

episodes.name: The Hawk and the Spider
episodes.overview: Iron Man has a difficult time stopping thieves from stealing the UI chip.

episodes.name: Enter: Iron Monger
episodes.overview: Stane perfects a more powerful armor; Tony and Rhodey must use their brains.

episodes.name: Fugitive of S.H.I.E.L.D.
episodes.overview: Nick Fury seeks Iron Man's help when plans are stolen from S.H.I.E.L.D.; Black Widow sets up Iron Man.

episodes.name: All the Best People Are Mad
episodes.overview: Rhona turns Tomorrow Academy into a maze of traps for Tony and his schoolmates.

episodes.name: Heavy Mettle
episodes.overview: After Stane is fired from Stark International, he discovers Iron Man's identity and plans to destroy him.

episodes.name: Mandarin's Quest
episodes.overview: Mandarin offers Tony information about his father in exchange for Tony's help in claiming the eighth Makluan ring.

episodes.name: Hostile Takeover
episodes.overview: When Hammer buys out Stark International, Tony vows to reveal his true nature to the world.

episodes.name: Extremis
episodes.overview: When Agent Mallen is fired, he takes a serum and mutates into a maniac bent on revenge.

episodes.name: The X-Factor
episodes.overview: Tony discovers that his new friend is a mutant on the run from Magneto.

episodes.name: Iron Man 2099
episodes.overview: In the future, Tony Stark’s grandson Andros is Iron Man 2099. Except his time-travelling super-armor isn’t designed to save the day, but instead to eliminate Tony Stark!

episodes.name: Control-Alt-Delete
episodes.overview: Tony wakes up in a virtual world created by the Controller in a plan to enslave the city.

episodes.name: Doomsday
episodes.overview: After Dr. Doom captures the ninth ring and Tony's father, Iron Man must team up with an enemy to stop him.

episodes.name: The Hammer Falls
episodes.overview: To keep his company from the Starks, an increasingly insane Justin Hammer unleashes Titanium Man on his former henchmen and develops a sinister zombie gas!

episodes.name: Rage of the Hulk
episodes.overview: Fugitive scientist Bruce Banner seeks out the Starks for help, but when the Army co-opts S.H.I.E.L.D. to make an attack, Iron Man must fight and subdue the Hulk in order to save him!

episodes.name: Iron Monger Lives
episodes.overview: Someone is after Rhodey and Pepper and sets a explosive in the armory. Meanwhile, Obadiah Stane and Iron Monger return, and Iron Man learns that it is not really Stane as the pilot. In the end, the pilot turns out to be Whitney Stane (Madame Masque) who is looking to get revenge on Tony Stark.

episodes.name: The Dragonseed
episodes.overview: Pepper gets a suit. Gene finds the tenth ring, defeats the last guardian which turns out to be a Makluan. Howard Stark reveals to Tony that he knew that he was Iron Man the whole time.

episodes.name: The Makluan Invasion Part 1: Annihilate!
episodes.overview: Mandarin signals the Makluan Overlord's alien fleet to invade Earth.

episodes.name: The Makluan Invasion Part 2: Unite!
episodes.overview: Iron Man, War Machine and Rescue must unite Nick Fury, Hawkeye, Black Widow, Black Panther and the Hulk to stop the Makluan Overlord from destroying the Earth.
